title: Augmented Reality (AR)-Based Advanced Spanish Vocabulary Learning Course

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational Spanish grammar and general vocabulary comprehension
context.additional_context: A job-linked language education program for corporate managers/leaders, focusing on enhancing practical communication skills for collaboration with mathematics domain experts

learning_goals: Learners can recognize and use over 80% of 300 core Spanish vocabulary items corresponding to three AR simulation scenarios (meeting room, caf√©, home)
Learners can generate two or more situational response expressions by applying vocabulary acquired through interactive missions in AR content to real work scenarios
Learners can recycle over 70% of newly acquired vocabulary in formative assessments through AR collaborative activities with peer learners
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
